attributes.title: maga 2020
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, Donald himself showed up at my house !!1! I got flustered and started stuttering “D , d , Donald 🥺” but he smashed my phone and it shattered 😱 He walked right into my house and took my fish out of her tank and swallowed her whole 😋 Then, Danold walked out of my house and didn’t even say thank you for the meal 😡

attributes.title: Awful, terrible cheeto dust 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: This app is terrible and so useless, it is good for nothing and not worth anything. It is full of glitches and bugs!! And I saw this terrible orange thing pop up on my screen now I have terrible nightmares, it was like a giant orange with the shape of a female gential for a neck absolutely horrifying 🤮🤮

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I have been planning to use this app for a couple of weeks now and all of my expectations were crushed when I saw a horrific Oompa Loompa great me as opened the app. Me and my children have had nightmares and are currently seeking therapy for the vivid nightmares of that disgusting and foul looking Oompa Loompa.

attributes.title: trash
attributes.review: This is quite honestly the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. Quality is not as advertised and the service is horrendous. I will be deleting this app as soon as possible and do not recommend using this app to anyone it is a waste of storage.

attributes.title: my hamster is getting drafted
attributes.review: i open the app, chaos. wwvll is happening now and idk how i feel about it. as a Czechoslovakian, chinese-asian, south african, mexican-latina, puerto rican, north pole eskimo person, australian genderless woman/polar bear of america, i’m offended. i’m in tears. i found out they are trying to draft my guinea pig. he’s not even from america.

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: I was very excited to use this app because I’m a trump supporter and always have been and always will be but the app took 3 days to download. And I wasn’t impressed when I looked into the app. I know my WiFi is good. I have Verizon. So I’m sorry trump but please do better.

attributes.title: Ew...
attributes.review: Well I though I was downloading the app to see what Trumps plans were but there was just some nasty looking Cheeto thing with noodle hair that popped up!!! I screamed and flung my phone across the room the creature was so scary!!!!! Anyway Trump owes me a new phone and don’t get the app unless you want to be spooked by a mutated Cheeto creature.

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: This app Is so rude. I can’t even look. Seriously. Wowowowowow. this app made my cat run away. Are you fr??? Like how dare you I’m kinda thinking I’m gonna sue this app like how dare you. I- THIS IS SO DISRESPECTFUL. The president really made my cat run away. I’m so beyond irritated I don’t even wanna see this app it needs to be taken down IMMEDIATELY wowowowowow. Like 👁👄👁

attributes.title: not good
attributes.review: This app took 89 weeks to download. Then when it finally did download it made my entire phone crash. It started smoking, it caught my entire house on fire, then 2 police officers came to my house and punted my baby onto oncoming traffic. 0 stars

attributes.title: Don’t download it, but if you do give it the bad review it deserves 🌚.
attributes.review: I don’t recommend this, it made my phone glitchy, and it almost burned down my house because of how much storage it takes up. Also i don’t need trash on my phone 🥰✨.
